page.title: 12Hellingly Church.
page.content: On the {Domesday}project my form went to{Hellingly}village. We were split into four groups. The first week my group went to {Hellingly Village {Church}St.Peters, St.Pauls. The first recorder vicar there was in the twelfth century, I cannot remember his name though. The pews in the church have recently been renewed and I don't think the fit very well in the church. On the right hand side of the knave there is an iron tomb in the shape of a small woman which was only uncovered recently but did not have any remains in it. Outside there is a large gravelyard which surrounds the church. I think it must look very sinister at night, but I think it is very pretty by day. I enjoyed my visit to{ {HELLINGLY.}
